title: Strings and Runes
description: This lab focuses on Go strings and runes. In Go, strings are read-only slices of bytes, and runes are integers that represent Unicode code points. This lab will explore how to work with strings and runes in Go.

meta.title: Go Strings and Runes | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Explore the fundamentals of working with strings and runes in Go programming language. Learn how to handle UTF-8 encoded text and manipulate Unicode code points.
meta.keywords: Go, Strings, Runes, Programming, Tutorials, UTF-8, Unicode

verify.name: Verify Go Program Outputs Length of String
